title: Node.js: Read File with fs.readFileSync
story: The fs module is your gateway to the filesystem. Let's read a file!
instructions: Use fs.readFileSync() to read the file '/tmp/message.txt' and print its contents.

hints.text: Use fs.readFileSync(filepath, 'utf8') to read text files.
The file path is '/tmp/message.txt'. Don't forget to specify 'utf8' encoding!
